org.openimaj.tools.cbir

Class VLADIndexerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.tools.cbir.VLADBuilder
      • org.openimaj.tools.cbir.VLADIndexerBuilder

  • public class VLADIndexerBuilder
extends VLADBuilder
    Tool to build a VLADIndexerData which can be used to build efficient Product-quantised PCA-VLAD indexes.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
